text: Martina Savioli (born 6 September 1990 in Piove di Sacco) is an Italian water polo player. She was a member of the Italian women's national water polo team. She played at the 2011 World Aquatics Championships and 2015 Women's LEN Super Cup. == References == == Other websites == * Martina Savioli, getty Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Italian water polo players
title: Martina Savioli
